message: Pravin Gordhan was a target of Zumas and Malema's because he was fighting against corruption . All political parties know they have do something about the youth and development and job creation. Just have to choose the party that you believe will deliver. Is Molefe still in Transnet? The reform was about getting rid of competent people who worked for Transnet. Sophisticated operation to commit fraud and corruption. Tracey is dumb Intelligent people will not vote ANC or EFF Wise people will not vote ANC or EFF Taxpayers will not vote ANC or EFF Tax payers keep this economy alive they will not vote for these corrupt parties. Only because 90% of non taxpayers will vote for ANC and EFF. Africa has been free from colonisation for decades. Stop using that past history as an excuse for Africa's failures. Africans must admit that their own elected governments have failed Africa. The culture of corruption needs to cease. Malema sits with Russian mafia who pays his bills and campaigns. Molefe was supeoned to appear Felix.. Google it. Media has written on this. Torching more buildings and clinics ..watching the news The Bantu arrived in South Africa long after the settlers It never captured my mind but there is nothing a minority can do but watch it go down hill Zuma is Malemas Pappa Malema is a Zuma Not if you want European aid and medicine "That means no retro viral drugs for HIV Address your population about birth control. poverty breeds poverty Haha haha. Don't like the truth about the real cause of poverty Communist China owns South Africa economically When the ANC government can no longer pay its debt back to the Chinese they will invade. I haven't seen any progress in the newly elected government in Zimbabwe. The ANC owes communist China billions Yes Derrick as they did to Mugabe in Zimbabwe and he literally wet his pants three times. By the way I am not from the West my ancestors have been here 6000 years ago. I have never and will never leave my Africa or my roots they are ingrained in this earth. Get to the root of corruption it has nothing to do with the ordinary citizens of this country or Farms. Cyril looks like a bull frog He looks like he just came out of the boiling pot ü§£ Molefe knows exactly the route to syphone funds. If the ANC win and don't deliver we will come after the voters that voted them in power. If the ANC win and don't deliver please don't go burning and destroying South Africa because you voted them into. power again. Well If Ramophosa wins which means an ANC government all over again. If he and his party don't deliver.. heads will roll ANC is Divided by those who got away with corruption and those who have not. The heat is on.. Respect your fathers and mothers It sounds like the degree was from a lucky packet Yes true and the Zulu arrived at the same time as the settlers We are going to do that by voting for the DA All this hate that exists in the ANC and EFF is not going to build South Africa's economy . The bushman are not of the same race as other tribes I have no respect for a party of thugs the EFF Well I know the ANC will win which is so much better than having the thugs of the EFF. But the DA will be a great contender he he Has Zuma you forgot the Indians and the curry favour. he he Indians don't want to be black they want to be Indians and curry favour Now Zuma have you put on your intelligent spectacles??? ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ Jacob are you Malemas father? I hear everyone wants to be his father.. but Julius got you into power. It's too late the Chinese own the resources The Chinese will invade if the EFF win infact they will do what they did to Mugabe. The Chinese did not need proof they removed Mugabe silently so very silently and peacefully. It's true that the Chinese own Eskom and other state entities so they will have a say in this government. The Chinese are loaning the government R70 billion to build power stations because the world bank will not invest because of corruption. So whoever wins The Chinese have a huge stake in their investment. Stealing will not solve a thing
